instructions.de: Leicht links weiter auf Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.en: Continue slightly left onto Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.es: Continua ligeramente a la izquierda en Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.fr: Continuer légèrement à gauche sur Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kiri ke Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.pl: Kontynuuj łagodnie w lewo na Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните налево на Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.sv: Fortsätt med lätt vänstersväng in på Cool highway (Ref1)
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên trái vào Cool highway (Ref1)
